APSJ4MEJ.menuEnableParchmentHint: Replace the default white parchment background with a more aged, brownish-yellow look.
APSJ4MEJ.panelBonusDescription: A stylish panel to provide a Bonus message.
APSJ4MEJ.panelEffectDescription: A stylish panel to provide a message about Effects.
APSJ4MEJ.panelInformationDescription: A stylish panel to provide an Informational message.
APSJ4MEJ.panelLootDescription: A stylish panel to provide a Loot message.
APSJ4MEJ.panelNoteDescription: A stylish panel to provide a Note.
APSJ4MEJ.panelTrapDescription: A stylish panel to provide a message about a Trap.
APSJ4MEJ.panelWarningDescription: A stylish panel to provide a Warning message.
APSJ4MEJ.panelBody: The body of the message. Delete this for a banner style message.
APSJ4MEJ.blockCardDescription: A stylish block to display the description and stats of a card from a deck.
APSJ4MEJ.blockCardBody:
Description of the card and its effects.

You can place an image on top of the card to the left and it will automatically be sized to fit the card.
APSJ4MEJ.blockEncounterDescription: A stylish block for displaying encounter data and descrptions.
APSJ4MEJ.blockEncounterBody:
Enter a detailed description of the environment and scenario here to read to the players.

Drag Actor tokens from your compendium into the Adversaries list on the right for easy setup of the encounter.
APSJ4MEJ.blockMagicItemDescription: A stylish block to display a magic item's description and stats.
APSJ4MEJ.blockMagicItemBody:
Description of the item and its abilities.

Place Stats in the aside to the right, and a link to the item below the divider.
APSJ4MEJ.blockReadAloudDescription: A stylish block to denote flavor text to be read aloud to the players.
APSJ4MEJ.blockReadAloudBody: Flavor text to read aloud to the players.
